path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - Mar3 Token and Staking - v1.0.pdf

findings.title: Incorrect Value of `ONE_DAY_IN_SECONDS` Constant
findings.description: The constant `ONE_DAY_IN_SECONDS` is set to a value of 10 for testing purposes, causing the waiting time for user unstaking to be very low.

findings.title: Missing check `expiredAt` variable
findings.description: The variable `expiredAt` is used to limit the time of use for the signature. However, if the value of this variable is large, the signature may be reused after users `unstakeLp()`.

findings.title: Should check the `signer` variable
findings.description: The constructor function should check whether the parameter `signer_` passed in is different from the `address(0)` and declare the `signer` variable as immutable.

findings.title: Redundancy in comment
findings.description: The comment is used for redundant code, so it should be removed.

findings.title: Missing necessary events
findings.description: Events are important in Solidity because they provide an efficient way to notify external applications of changes that occur on the blockchain.
